description: Large Studio / Separated to make a living room and bedroom space, very cozy, clean on the 4th floor, Elevator Building, with large windows with great light. Laundry and Dryer in BLDG, Roof Deck, 2 blocks to C,E trains, 1/2 block to crosstown Bus, 2 blocks to Citi bike (two blocks to West Side Highway bike route to chelsea, Soho/ Tribecca and Wall Street, and all major NYC area's and attractions and shopping, Times Square, Midtown and Central Park.
name: Sunny Apartment in Hells Kitchen
review: The host canceled this reservation 59 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
